thread.title: Types Of Workouts That These 6 Bollywood Stars Swear By
thread.title_full: Types Of Workouts That These 6 Bollywood Stars Swear By

title: Types Of Workouts That These 6 Bollywood Stars Swear By
text:
A post shared by Malaika Arora Khan (@malaikaarorakhanofficial) on Dec 13, 2016 at 7:08pm PST Shilpa Shetty 
Actress Shilpa Shetty's workout goes beyond just fitness, but also towards wellness, as she is a big practitioner of Yoga. She recently started a wellness series and website to help people with getting in shape, in all aspects of their life. Live from the Yoga Masterclass in Spain! #IndiainSpain #YogaInSpain #IWasHere #IIFA2016 A post shared by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Jun 25, 2016 at 3:55am PDT The secret lies in understanding our body ,mind and soul. We can attain balance on the outside and inside.But before we start, it is important to understand that leading a balanced life is an ongoing process and not a goal to be achieved just once. So, Here's to a new start !Shall we begin? #ShilpaShettyWellness #TheArtOfBalance #SwasthRahoMastRaho www.theshilpashetty.com A post shared by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Feb 17, 2017 at 11:05pm PST A post shared by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Feb 19, 2017 at 2:25am PST Sidharth Malhotra 
Sidharth is a big gym buff, concentrating on strength and resistance training, and even squeezing in an aqua workout off late. The actor is very dedicated, and doesn't even let the absence of a gym stop him from working out. Ankle injury during #action but need results not excuses #training upper body #shoot @rocky_bodytransformer A post shared by Sidharth Malhotra (@s1dofficial) on Dec 15, 2016 at 1:34am PST Kill the monotony in workout ! #aquagym Today best change for weekends thanks to @rocky_bodytransformer #Sidfit #outdoor #training #pool A post shared by Sidharth Malhotra (@s1dofficial) on Jan 21, 2017 at 11:41pm PST A post shared by Sidharth Malhotra (@s1dofficial) on Nov 16, 2016 at 2:58am PST Jacqueline Fernandez 
Jacqueline doesn't limit herself when it comes to fitness. She does whatever it takes to maintain her fit AF body - from strength training at the gym, to yoga, to even horse-riding.
